original: @ga   @#/_/ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag
analyzed: @ga   @#/_/ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag
translated: Instructions on the Ritual Actions of Kurukulla

original: @##/_/'di'i bsnyen pa sngon du song nas/_las la sbyor ba'i tshhe/
analyzed: @##/_/'di'i bsnyen pa sngon du song nas/_las la sbyor ba'i tshhe/
translated: Having first completed the approach, when applying the ritual actions,

original: yar ngo'i tshhes cig nas bco lnga'i bar du/_rang nyid gos dmar po gyon zhing /
analyzed: yar ngo'i tshhes cig nas bco lnga'i bar du/_rang nyid gos dmar po gyon zhing /
translated: one should wear red clothing and🔽meditate on the Bhagavati.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i bskur bsgoms la/_nyin re bzhin thun gsum mam bzhi
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i bskur bsgoms la/_nyin re bzhin thun gsum mam bzhi
translated: In three or four sessions each day,

original: rnal 'byor gyis/_sngags khri phrag re bzlas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma la
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyis/_sngags khri phrag re bzlas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma la
translated: one should recite the mantra ten thousand times.

original: nam bza' dmar po dang /_tshan d+ha na dmar po'i man+dal dang /_me tog dmar
analyzed: nam bza' dmar po dang /_tshan d+ha na dmar po'i man+dal dang /_me tog dmar
translated: One should offer a red feast, a mandala of red sandalwood, red flowers,

original: po la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul nas/_bsgrub bya dbang du 'du bar gsol ba🔽btab nas/_dbang gi thab du gzhung bzhin sbyin sreg bya zhing /_rang gi snying🔽gi hri las 'od 'phros pas/_yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_bsgrub
analyzed: po la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul nas/_bsgrub bya dbang du 'du bar gsol ba btab nas/_dbang gi thab du gzhung bzhin sbyin sreg bya zhing /_rang gi snying gi hri las 'od 'phros pas/_yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_bsgrub
translated: and so forth, and supplicate for the subjugation of the victim.🔽One should perform the homa in the subjugation fire pit as in the treatise, and light rays radiate from the hri in one’s heart.🔽On a wind mandala arisen from yam, visualize the victim naked with loose hair.

original: bya gcer du skra grol bar gyur pa bzhag nas/_ud pa la las 'phros pa'i
analyzed: bya gcer du skra grol bar gyur pa bzhag nas/_ud pa la las 'phros pa'i
translated: Light rays radiate from the utpala.

original: zhags pas mgrin pa nas bcings/_lcags kyus snying khar btab ste drangs/
analyzed: zhags pas mgrin pa nas bcings/_lcags kyus snying khar btab ste drangs/
translated: They are bound by the noose around the neck and pulled by the iron hook in the heart.

original: rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod/_rigs sngags kyis stobs kyis bkug la/_rang gi
analyzed: rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod/_rigs sngags kyis stobs kyis bkug la/_rang gi
translated: They are moved by the force of the wind and summoned by the power of the mantra.

original: rkang pa'i drung du zhogs g.yon 'og tu bcug pa 'am/_gan rgyal du bzhag la/
analyzed: rkang pa'i drung du zhogs g.yon 'og tu bcug pa 'am/_gan rgyal du bzhag la/
translated: They arrive in front of you and are placed under your feet, either with their left legs and buttocks extended or with their legs and arms stretched out.

original: pho'i snying kha dang /_mo'i chos 'byung la lcags kyus btab cing /_rang gi snying
analyzed: pho'i snying kha dang /_mo'i chos 'byung la lcags kyus btab cing /_rang gi snying
translated: The iron hook in the heart of the male and in the dharma source of the female is pulled out.🔽From the hūṃ on the sun in your heart, eight fresh,

original: kha'i nyi ma'i steng gi hri_po las byung ba'i 'dab ma brgyad pa/_gsar pa🔽stong po skye gnas kyi bar du zug pa'i 'dab ma rnams la/_a i/_u ri li/
analyzed: kha'i nyi ma'i steng gi hri_po las byung ba'i 'dab ma brgyad pa/_gsar pa stong po skye gnas kyi bar du zug pa'i 'dab ma rnams la/_a i/_u ri li/
translated: new petals grow and pierce the womb.🔽On the petals are the eight long vowels: a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ.

original: e o ah_ring po brgyad las rab tu rgyags shing khros pa'i bung ba dmar po brgyad
analyzed: e o ah_ring po brgyad las rab tu rgyags shing khros pa'i bung ba dmar po brgyad
translated: From these, eight very fat and angry red bees🔽emerge and rise up through your left nostril.

original: rang gi sna bug g.yon pa'i rlung dang bsdongs te phyir mthon nas/_bsgrub bya'i
analyzed: rang gi sna bug g.yon pa'i rlung dang bsdongs te phyir mthon nas/_bsgrub bya'i
translated: They enter through the right nostril of the victim🔽and arrive at the heart, where there is a fresh,

original: sna bug g.yas nas zhugs te/_snying kha na pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad sar pa
analyzed: sna bug g.yas nas zhugs te/_snying kha na pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad sar pa
translated: eight-petaled lotus.

original: sdong po lte bar zug pa yod pa rnams la/_bung bas 'jibs pa'i sdong po rnams🔽rnying shing rid par byas nas/_'dab ma brgyad la/_a i u ri li e o a
analyzed: sdong po lte bar zug pa yod pa rnams la/_bung bas 'jibs pa'i sdong po rnams rnying shing rid par byas nas/_'dab ma brgyad la/_a i u ri li e o a
translated: The trees that have trunks that reach down to the navel are trees that bees suck on.🔽Having made them old and withered, on the eight petals are the eight short vowels: a, i, u, e, o, ai, au, and am.

original: ces pa'i dbyangs thung ngu brgyad yod pa la/_rang gi snying kha'i hri_'od
analyzed: ces pa'i dbyangs thung ngu brgyad yod pa la/_rang gi snying kha'i hri_'od
translated: From the hook-like red light of hri in one’s heart center,

original: dmar po lcags kyu dang /_hri yi rnam pa can rnams rna ba g.yas nas 'thon te/
analyzed: dmar po lcags kyu dang /_hri yi rnam pa can rnams rna ba g.yas nas 'thon te/
translated: the form of hri emerges from the right ear

original: mda'i stong nas zhugs/_mde'u nas 'thon pa bsgrub bya'i snying khar song nas/
analyzed: mda'i stong nas zhugs/_mde'u nas 'thon pa bsgrub bya'i snying khar song nas/
translated: and enters the arrow. Having emerged from the arrowhead, it goes to the heart of the victim.

original: des ming gi yi ge dang po blangs te/_rang gi snying kha'i hril stim/_bsgrub bya🔽mo yin na/_mtshhan ma'i dkyil du bsnun pas/_zla mtshhan 'dzag cing chags
analyzed: des ming gi yi ge dang po blangs te/_rang gi snying kha'i hril stim/_bsgrub bya mo yin na/_mtshhan ma'i dkyil du bsnun pas/_zla mtshhan 'dzag cing chags
translated: It takes the first letter of the name and dissolves into the hri in one’s heart center.

original: pa dang ldan par bsam/_bung ba te rang gi dbugs kyis bskul te/_bsgrub
analyzed: pa dang ldan par bsam/_bung ba te rang gi dbugs kyis bskul te/_bsgrub
translated: If the victim is a woman, imagine that it pierces the center of her vagina, causing the menstrual blood to flow and fill the vagina.🔽The bees are urged on by one’s breath and emerge from the victim’s left nostril.

original: bya'i sna bug g.yon nas dbyung /_bung ba rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i dbyangs yig
analyzed: bya'i sna bug g.yon nas dbyung /_bung ba rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i dbyangs yig
translated: The bees suck on the victim’s vowels and consonants.

original: re re khyer te 'ongs pa bdag gi sna bug g.yas nas zhugs/_snying kha'i hril thim/
analyzed: re re khyer te 'ongs pa bdag gi sna bug g.yas nas zhugs/_snying kha'i hril thim/
translated: Each of these enters through your right nostril and dissolves into the hrīḥ in your heart.

original: yang rang gi sna bug g.yas nas song /_bsgrub bya'i sna bug g.yon nas zhugs/
analyzed: yang rang gi sna bug g.yas nas song /_bsgrub bya'i sna bug g.yon nas zhugs/
translated: Then it exits through your right nostril and enters through the left nostril of the person to be liberated.

original: snying kha'i pad+ma'i hri_la thim/_g.yon nas 'thon pas rang gi g.yas nas zhugs/
analyzed: snying kha'i pad+ma'i hri_la thim/_g.yon nas 'thon pas rang gi g.yas nas zhugs/
translated: It dissolves into the hrīḥ in the lotus of his heart. It exits through the left nostril and enters through your right nostril.

original: sngar bzhin snying khar thim pas/_rang gzhan ye shes kyi ngo bo dbyer med par
analyzed: sngar bzhin snying khar thim pas/_rang gzhan ye shes kyi ngo bo dbyer med par
translated: As before, it dissolves into your heart, and you imagine that you and the other person become inseparable in essence with the primordial wisdom being.

original: bsam/_de nas rang gi phyag mtshhan gyi mda' las ud pa la dmar po'i mda'i
analyzed: bsam/_de nas rang gi phyag mtshhan gyi mda' las ud pa la dmar po'i mda'i
translated: Then from the arrow of your hand, red lotus arrows

original: ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag
analyzed: ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag
translated: The esoteric instructions of Kurukullā’s activity

original: tshhogs spros pas pho'i snying kha dang /_mo'i gsang gnas nas mda'i mde'us phug🔽nas/_mda'i sgra des bskul nas bung ba rnams bsgrub bya'i sna bug g.yon nas
analyzed: tshhogs spros pas pho'i snying kha dang /_mo'i gsang gnas nas mda'i mde'us phug nas/_mda'i sgra des bskul nas bung ba rnams bsgrub bya'i sna bug g.yon nas
translated: The arrow tip enters through the heart of a man or the secret place of a woman.🔽The sound of the arrow’s twang summons bees, which exit through the left nostril of the person to be liberated,🔽enter through your right nostril, and dissolve into you.

original: 'thon te/_rang gi sna bug g.yas nas zhugs nas thim/_/yang bsgrub bya'i rnam
analyzed: 'thon te/_rang gi sna bug g.yas nas zhugs nas thim/_/yang bsgrub bya'i rnam
translated: Then the person to be liberated’s

original: shes mda'i dra ba 'am/_'gal me'i 'khor lo lta bu'i nang du bcug ste_/🔽dbang du bsdus pas/_mgo 'khor te myos shing dran pa med par bsam/_de
analyzed: shes mda'i dra ba 'am/_'gal me'i 'khor lo lta bu'i nang du bcug ste_/ dbang du bsdus pas/_mgo 'khor te myos shing dran pa med par bsam/_de
translated: they are placed inside a net of knowledge or a whirling firebrand.

original: nas ud pa la'i zhags pa spros pas bsgrub bya'i ske nas bcings/_ud pa la'i
analyzed: nas ud pa la'i zhags pa spros pas bsgrub bya'i ske nas bcings/_ud pa la'i
translated: Then, having been bound around the neck of the one to be subdued by the emanation of the noose of the lotus,

original: lcags kyu spros pas pho'i snying kha dang /_mo'i b+ha ga nas phug cing /_'od zer
analyzed: lcags kyu spros pas pho'i snying kha dang /_mo'i b+ha ga nas phug cing /_'od zer
translated: the emanation of the hook of the lotus pierces the heart of a male and the bhaga of a female,

original: dmar po rab tu 'bar bas dbang du byas par bsam zhing bdag la dga' zhing
analyzed: dmar po rab tu 'bar bas dbang du byas par bsam zhing bdag la dga' zhing
translated: and one imagines that they are brought under control by the blazing red light rays.

original: chags pa'i sems su bsams la/_om ku ru kul+le hri_che ge mo wa sham ku ru ho yang na che
analyzed: chags pa'i sems su bsams la/_om ku ru kul+le hri_che ge mo wa sham ku ru ho yang na che
translated: Thinking that they have a mind of delight and attachment, recite oṃ kuru ku llé hri.🔽For summoning a king, recite oṃ kuru ku llé hri.🔽For summoning an ordinary person, recite oṃ kuru ku llé hri.

original: ge mo ba she ma na ye hri/_zhes pas rgyal po 'gug pa la 'bum/_phal pa la khri la sogs🔽pa bzlas shing /_thun gyi mthar bdag byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa'i bsam
analyzed: ge mo ba she ma na ye hri/_zhes pas rgyal po 'gug pa la 'bum/_phal pa la khri la sogs🔽pa bzlas shing /_thun gyi mthar bdag byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa'i bsam
translated: For summoning a woman, recite oṃ kuru ku llé hri.🔽For summoning a man, recite oṃ kuru ku llé hri.

original: gtan las byung ba ltar yang yang bsam zhing 'khor lo bzhi la brten pa'i tshan da li'i yi ge rnams
analyzed: gtan las byung ba ltar yang yang bsam zhing 'khor lo bzhi la brten pa'i tshan da li'i yi ge rnams
translated: Recite the letters of the Tsandali based on the four cakras.

original: bung bas blang ba bzlas so/_/de'i mthar zla mtshhan gos pa'i ras sam/_gro ga la
analyzed: bung bas blang ba bzlas so/_/de'i mthar zla mtshhan gos pa'i ras sam/_gro ga la
translated: At the end of that, on a cloth that has been worn by a woman or on birch bark,🔽write with red sandalwood, saffron, or the blood of a

original: tshan dan dmar po 'am/_gur gum gyis sam/_gi ha~m dang /_srin lag gi
analyzed: tshan dan dmar po 'am/_gur gum gyis sam/_gi ha~m dang /_srin lag gi
translated: fingernail and a finger🔽on a sixteen-petaled cakra that resembles the leaf of a blue lotus.

original: khrag dag gis ud pa la'i 'dab ma'i sna ba lta bu'i tshakra rtshib bcu drug pa'i lte bar
analyzed: khrag dag gis ud pa la'i 'dab ma'i sna ba lta bu'i tshakra rtshib bcu drug pa'i lte bar
translated: In the center, write hrīḥ.

original: hri_de'i mtha' mar che ge mo wa sham ku ru ho ces pa bri'o/_/'dab ma rnams la🔽re re la bsgrub bya'i ming gi yi ge la/_ku ru kul+le ces pa'i yi ge mgo nang bstan bzhis
analyzed: hri_de'i mtha' mar che ge mo wa sham ku ru ho ces pa bri'o/_/'dab ma rnams la re re la bsgrub bya'i ming gi yi ge la/_ku ru kul+le ces pa'i yi ge mgo nang bstan bzhis
translated: Around that, write the name of the person to be subdued and “make him/her submit” (vāśaṃ kuru ho).🔽On each of the petals,🔽write the name of the person to be subdued, surrounding each syllable with the four syllables of kuru ku llé, with the heads of the syllables facing inward.

original: bskor ba bsgrub bya'i ming can 'big bri/_phyi'i mu khyud gsum po la om 'big gis
analyzed: bskor ba bsgrub bya'i ming can 'big bri/_phyi'i mu khyud gsum po la om 'big gis
translated: On the outer three circles, write oṃ bhikṣa bhikṣā.

original: bskor ba bri'o/_/de nas 'ag nas 'byung rab gnas ji lta ba bzhin byas la/_ming
analyzed: bskor ba bri'o/_/de nas 'ag nas 'byung rab gnas ji lta ba bzhin byas la/_ming
translated: Then, as stated in the tantra, perform the consecration and write the name of the person to be subdued.

original: la bsgrub bya stim la/_srad bu dmar pos dkris nas/_spra tshhil las byas pa'i
analyzed: la bsgrub bya stim la/_srad bu dmar pos dkris nas/_spra tshhil las byas pa'i
translated: Tie it with a red string and put it in a small box.🔽

original: ling kha sor brgyad pa'i snying khar bcug la/_de bsgrub byar bskyed cing yang
analyzed: ling kha sor brgyad pa'i snying khar bcug la/_de bsgrub byar bskyed cing yang
translated: Then, after the object of practice is dissolved into that, tie it with a red string and put it in the heart of a linga made of clay.🔽Generate that as the object of practice and repeatedly summon and absorb.

original: yang dgug bzhug byas la/_de bu mo gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa srad  yang dgug bzhug byas la/🔽bu dmar po zangs kyi khab kyi mig du bcug te/_des ling kha'i skye gnas su🔽thabs shes rab kyi bye brag gis skyes pa'i bud med dbang du byed na khab kyi 'dren pa'i khab rtshe rang gi
analyzed: yang dgug bzhug byas la/_de bu mo gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa srad  yang dgug bzhug byas la/ bu dmar po zangs kyi khab kyi mig du bcug te/_des ling kha'i skye gnas su thabs shes rab kyi bye brag gis skyes pa'i bud med dbang du byed na khab kyi 'dren pa'i khab rtshe rang gi
translated: Then, after a young girl has spun the thread, put a red copper needle into the eye of the thread.🔽With that, the needle that draws in, which is the distinction of method and wisdom, is inserted into the linga’s vagina.

original: bstan nas tshhim po byed pa bzhin la 'dren pa zer ro/_/tshhul du drangs pas 'od zer gyi lcags kyus
analyzed: bstan nas tshhim po byed pa bzhin la 'dren pa zer ro/_/tshhul du drangs pas 'od zer gyi lcags kyus
translated: If one is magnetizing a woman, the needle that draws in is inserted into the vagina of the woman.🔽If one is magnetizing a man, the needle that draws in is inserted into one’s own penis.

original: skyes pa'i rkang pa bud med kyi skye gnas phug cing zhags pas drangs par bsam zhing /_om ku
analyzed: skyes pa'i rkang pa bud med kyi skye gnas phug cing zhags pas drangs par bsam zhing /_om ku
translated: Since it is drawn in, imagine that the hook of light rays enters the vagina of the woman and draws in the feet of the man with the noose.🔽“Oṃ ku

original: ru kul+le hri_che ge mo wa sham ku ru ho/_a kar+sha ya hriswa ha ces bzlas so/_/de ltar
analyzed: ru kul+le hri_che ge mo wa sham ku ru ho/_a kar+sha ya hriswa ha ces bzlas so/_/de ltar
translated: Recite, Rukulla he hrīṃ. So-and-so, make him submit! Akarṣaya hṛi svāhā.

original: bzlas pas rmi lam du gzhon nu ma'i tshhogs kyis bdag la dga' zhing /_me
analyzed: bzlas pas rmi lam du gzhon nu ma'i tshhogs kyis bdag la dga' zhing /_me
translated: If, through such recitation, in dreams a host of young women are delighted with you,🔽give you a garland of red flowers,

original: tog dmar po'i phreng ba dang /_rgyan dang /_gos dang /_zas la sogs
analyzed: tog dmar po'i phreng ba dang /_rgyan dang /_gos dang /_zas la sogs
translated: ornaments, clothes, food, and so forth,

original: pa gter ba dang /_skye bo mang pos phyag dang bkur ti byed pa la sogs yang
analyzed: pa gter ba dang /_skye bo mang pos phyag dang bkur ti byed pa la sogs yang
translated: and many people repeatedly make prostrations and honor you, it is certain.

original: yang byung na nges pa'o/_/des ma grub na yang sngar bzhin bsgrubs te/_thun
analyzed: yang byung na nges pa'o/_/des ma grub na yang sngar bzhin bsgrubs te/_thun
translated: If that is not accomplished, practice as before, and in the intervals

original: mtshhams su ling kha te seng ldeng gi me la 'thigs tsham du gdung zhing spel tshhig can
analyzed: mtshhams su ling kha te seng ldeng gi me la 'thigs tsham du gdung zhing spel tshhig can
translated: burn the name in a fire of khadira wood.

original: sngags bzlas nas skang pas mnan na/_de ma thag du dbang du 'du'o/_/des
analyzed: sngags bzlas nas skang pas mnan na/_de ma thag du dbang du 'du'o/_/des
translated: If you recite the mantra and suppress it with your voice, it will be brought under control immediately.🔽If that is not accomplished,

original: kyang ma grub na/_dpyid zla ra ba'i tshhes brgyad la/_gos dmar bgos te/
analyzed: kyang ma grub na/_dpyid zla ra ba'i tshhes brgyad la/_gos dmar bgos te/
translated: on the eighth day of the first spring month, dress in red clothes,

original: myos byed kyis 'bras bu za so so 'cha' zhing dpral bar rgya skegs kyi thig le byas nas
analyzed: myos byed kyis 'bras bu za so so 'cha' zhing dpral bar rgya skegs kyi thig le byas nas
translated: eat the fruit of the intoxicant, and make a bindu of vermillion on your forehead.

original: tshakra skang pas mnan te/_ming spel can gyi sngags bzlas la/_srin bu karti ka
analyzed: tshakra skang pas mnan te/_ming spel can gyi sngags bzlas la/_srin bu karti ka
translated: Having pressed the cakra to the body, recite the mantra with the name of the person.🔽The worms kṛtika, Vajradharma, and Vajrasūrya

original: dang /_rdo rje chos dang /_rdo rje nyi ma rnams/_'bras sa lu'i nam 'bras dkar po so
analyzed: dang /_rdo rje chos dang /_rdo rje nyi ma rnams/_'bras sa lu'i nam 'bras dkar po so
translated: are mixed with the juice of the dhāraṇī fruit, white rice, and so on.

original: ba med pa yin gzungs khu ba rnams sbyar ba la/_rtsha ba'i sngags kyis sngags nas/
analyzed: ba med pa yin gzungs khu ba rnams sbyar ba la/_rtsha ba'i sngags kyis sngags nas/
translated: Having enchanted it with the mantra of the hot one,🔽whomever it is given to will be brought under control.

original: gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/grol bar 'dod na tshakra 'o mas bkrus
analyzed: gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/grol bar 'dod na tshakra 'o mas bkrus
translated: If one wishes to liberate, wash the cakra with milk,

original: la 'khor lo ras sar pa cig la bris la/_ming spel bar che ge mo bcings pa/
analyzed: la 'khor lo ras sar pa cig la bris la/_ming spel bar che ge mo bcings pa/
translated: write the cakra on a new piece of cloth, and write “So-and-so is bound.🔽May he be liberated from his deeds.”

original: las grol bar gyur cig ces pa bris na/_rab gnas byas la bdag gis bzung
analyzed: las grol bar gyur cig ces pa bris na/_rab gnas byas la bdag gis bzung
translated: Having performed the consecration, hold it to oneself🔽and recite “oṃ kuru ku llē hṛi. May so-and-so be liberated from his bonds.

original: la om ku ru kul+le hri_che ge mo bcings pa las grol bar gyur cig swa ha/_ces
analyzed: la om ku ru kul+le hri_che ge mo bcings pa las grol bar gyur cig swa ha/_ces
translated: Svaha.”

original: ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag
analyzed: ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag
translated: This is the esoteric instruction of the application of the activity of Kurukullā.🔽Recite and then remove the cakra from oneself.

original: bzlas shing de nas rang nyid la tshakra med par bya/_tshakra de sre mong gi tshhad du
analyzed: bzlas shing de nas rang nyid la tshakra med par bya/_tshakra de sre mong gi tshhad du
translated: The size of the cakra is that of a mongoose.

original: sbas na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag pan+di ta don
analyzed: sbas na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ku ru kul+le'i las sbyor gyi man ngag pan+di ta don
translated: If it is hidden, one will be liberated.

original: yod rdo rjes bla ma ba ri lo tsha ba la gnang ngo /_/'di la shin tu dam par mdzad
analyzed: yod rdo rjes bla ma ba ri lo tsha ba la gnang ngo /_/'di la shin tu dam par mdzad
translated: The upadeshas of the activity of Kurukulla were given by the pandita Amoghavajra to the guru Varalocana.🔽He was very strict about this and did not spread it to many people.

original: nas re re tsham las mang po la spel ba'i srol med do/_/gsang ngo sbas so//_//
analyzed: nas re re tsham las mang po la spel ba'i srol med do/_/gsang ngo sbas so//_//
translated: It is secret and hidden.

original: zla tshha__/khyab pa
analyzed: zla tshha__/khyab pa
translated: The pervading

original: gnad lu _nga ba_/'di yun
analyzed: gnad lu _nga ba_/'di yun
translated: The vital point is this.
